name: Corbeille de fruits
description:
Ludum Dare #50

The game is a narrative experience in a 3D environment, about chasing the truth and facing its inevitability.  The player is invited to try and delay it, if he or she can…

The three of us worked together to assemble this, one of us doing 3D work and conding on Unity, while the two others used Ink to create a script for the story. Both of us had no experience in programming, learning on the spot was fun and challenging and we enjoyed (almost) every minute. :)

We hope you enjoy our work and will gladly receive any and all feedback, as we plan to keep working on it in the weeks to come, if we can.

Know bug : Sometimes empty choices diplay and may restart the game if you pick them (so, do not pick them…)

Note : If someone can compile Unity for mac and/or Linux, we are interested (source will be online Thursday night)

Some bug fix, story and visuals updates planned soon post jam. Sources will be added soon (need some sleep before)
